title: Why has Pender County block any new manufacturing or \big box\" businesses in the county? Is it true that the county commisioners don\'t want the standard of living to go up and put hardship on the local business man? What about those of us that can\'t find jobs but still like living in the county? Should we move elsewhere?"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16388
